sections.heading: to 29-18-12 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2003, ch. 255, § 14 repealed 29-18-1 to 29-18-12 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2001, ch. 219, the former Concealed Handgun Carry Act, effective July 1, 2003. For provisions of former sections,seethe 2002 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For similar present provisions,see29-19-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.
